headline: General Dynamics Bath Iron Works Awarded Contract for Additional DDG 51 Destroyer
summary: General Dynamics Bath Iron Works, a business unit of General Dynamics (NYSE:GD), announced today that the U.S. Navy has exercised an option to add an additional DDG 51 destroyer to the multi-year contract awarded in 2023.
